name: Untitled Space Game (HouseDev)
description:
Gameplay:

For now you just move around the planet and shoot enemies but I plan on adding more weapons , enemies, locations and abilities, so i would love to get more ideas from you guys!

Story : 

A weird new planet suspiciously was spotted in the solar system, it seems to have faint signals of a life form , you were sent there to investigate it and learn as much possible info about it.

Controls :

-Movement = WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Stick on controllers

-Aiming = Mouse / Right Stick on controllers

-Shooting=  LMB  / Right Trigger on controllers

-Restart=  R / East Button on controllers(B/O)
